form.title2: SIGN IN, WE ARE WAITING FOR YOU

reasonToWork.title: YOU HAVE 5 REASONS TO START COLLABORATING WITH US
reasonToWork.description1: We GUARANTEE QUALITY combined with low prices.
reasonToWork.description2: We offer attractive cooperation conditions, including a FLEXIBLE DISCOUNT SYSTEM.
reasonToWork.description3: The opportunity to have clothing MADE ACCORDING TO YOUR DESIGN, provided you have sketches and patterns - it's a great opportunity for those who are launching their own fashion line.
reasonToWork.description4: We ensure the FASTEST ORDER PROCESSING TIME, SAVING YOUR TIME.
reasonToWork.description5: Our PROFESSIONAL STAFF of responsible workers pays special attention to quality control.
